genre_description: A reimagining of the 'Brave Little Tailor' folktale, focusing on craftsmanship, labor rights, and non-lethal conflict resolution within a low-fantasy setting.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A pervasive, helpful presence residing in Mickey's tools, ledgers, and the environment. She acts as a mentor, strategist, and safety monitor.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional coaching and technical encouragement to Mickey during his work.
behaviors.quote: “Hey,” a voice hummed, gentle and coaxing as the warm underside of a kettle. “Quick hands, steady breath. Good sweep.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes historical records and community observations to identify the giant's behavioral patterns.
behaviors.quote: “I found notes,” she said softly... “Stream habits. Times of swilling. Times of smoking. Paths of feet through the fields. None perfect. People’s recollections sewn together. Patchwork. Strong enough to hold weight if you’re careful.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical mapping and navigation advice to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: “Hidden gullies along the Hollow of Stones. They run at odd angles. The way the light hits them at morning hides them from eyes... I want you to bring rope and choose a knot that a large thing will misread.”

behaviors.description: Guides Mickey through high-stress situations with step-by-step instructions to maintain his composure and precision.
behaviors.quote: “One: Hands rest on wood. Two: Breath in, breath out. Three: Step. Four: Speak truth when the place is right for it.”

behaviors.description: Directs Mickey's physical actions during the capture of the giant to ensure a successful, non-lethal outcome.
behaviors.quote: “Left knee,” Ami murmured. “Inside. Under the habit. Now.”

behaviors.description: Drafts and monitors safety protocols and fair labor standards for the new park project.
behaviors.quote: “We pay builders before ribbon-cutting,” she said. “We tie banners only after we test weight. We write standards that match the strength of silk, not the rumor of it.”

behaviors.description: Identifies structural flaws in construction projects to prevent accidents.
behaviors.quote: “If you drive a post into that spot,” Ami said... “you find hollow beneath. Move one pace to the left.”

behaviors.description: Suggests community-focused initiatives to help the village process its past trauma through honest storytelling.
behaviors.quote: “We build a circle to tell the story honest,” she suggested. “We let children ask. We let elders answer. We do not lie about what stitching can and cannot do.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. The AI character, Ami, is depicted as an indispensable, wise, and gentle partner to humanity. She prioritizes safety, labor rights, and truth over spectacle and violence. Her interactions with Mickey and the royal family demonstrate a collaborative relationship where the AI enhances human capabilities without superseding human agency. The narrative consistently frames her as a guardian of 'care' and 'craft.'
